cards.title: Debugger Menu
cards.setup: At the start of the game, select a card in the environment deck or trash. Put that card into play. You may repeat this effect any number of times.
gameplay: The environment deck may not play cards.
At the end of the environment turn, select a card in the environment deck or trash. Put that card into play. You may repeat this effect any number of times.
flippedGameplay: The environment deck may not play cards.
At the end of the environment turn, select a card in the environment deck or trash. Put that card into play. You may repeat this effect any number of times.

cards.title: 6. Stack a Deck
body: Select a deck. Select any number of cards from that deck or trash. Place the selected cards on the top of the deck in any order. If a hero deck was selected, you may also select cards from that hero's hand.

cards.title: 4. Send Cards to Trash
body: Select a deck. Select any number of cards from that deck. Send the selected cards to the appropriate trash. If a hero deck was selected, you may also select cards from that hero's hand.

cards.title: 1. Add Cards to Hand
body: Select a hero. Select any number of cards from that hero's deck or trash. Move the selected cards into that hero's hand.

cards.title: 3. Play Cards
body: Select a deck. Play any number of cards from that deck or trash. If a hero deck was selected, you may also select cards from that hero's hand.

cards.title: 2. Destroy Cards
body: Select any number of cards in play. Destroy the selected cards.

cards.title: 5. Set a Target's HP
body: Select a target in play. Select a value between 0 and that target's maximum HP. Set that target's HP to the selected value.
